tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: New trading systems are created from the Superalgos Project hierarchy, in particular, from the Other Hierarchies node.

paragraphs.text: But... you know what? We'll use one I created already!
Feel free to add a trading system if you wish, but delete it afterwards, as we are not going to use it!

I set up a trading system while you weren't watching so that I can reference existing nodes and take you to specific places while we move along this tutorial! Merely for technical reasons, if you must know!
